subject: Golf
Advertising and Marketing
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Endorsements
lead_paragraph: The lawsuit against the PGA Tour with more than 80 plaintiffs spotlights the question of whether golf is more a business or a game of sportsmanship and honor.
snippet: The lawsuit against the PGA Tour with more than 80 plaintiffs spotlights the question of whether golf is more a business or a game of sportsmanship and honor.
